item.description:
Save the date for our holiday party -- always our biggest bash of the year!

It's Over the River... and Through the Woods...
To the HOERMAN's House we go....

Hartford Heights Tall Club Holiday Party
Saturday, December 19, 2009
8 Deer Rock Drive in Amston
starting at 7:00 p.m.

Please call Don or Sharon at 860-530-1540
before Wednesday 12/16 to RSVP
What will you bring to round out the menu?

We will play the traditional “Yankee Swap” game!
Bring a wrapped gift;
Something classy, fun or practical;
No gag gifts, $15 value.

Remember…
• Call to RSVP 860-530-1540
• Bring an appetizer, dessert, beverage to share.
• Bring a gift for Yankee Swap (value $15.)
• Club Members $5. / Non-members $10.
• Wear your holiday spirit!


Be sure to check out the holiday flyer in the files section...
item.name: 2009 HHTC Holiday Party
